response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards. This exceptional item carries a unique value that transcends its tangible form, making it an investment in quality and excellence. Considering its unparalleled features and benefits, I propose a price of $15,000 for this remarkable product. I believe this offer reflects its true worth and provides you with an opportunity to own something truly special. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your consideration.", "product_price": 15000}
